p: The study enrolled 148 patients between March 2013 and August 2014 at 27 study sites in six countries (Australia, Georgia, Hungary, Israel, Poland, and the USA); all enrolled patients were included in the safety population (Fig. 1). The evaluable population comprised 147 patients who received at least one treatment with TC chemotherapy and at least one dose of either pegfilgrastim ( n = 36) or Rolontis ( n = 39 at 45 μg/kg, n = 36 at 135 μg/kg and n = 36 at 270 μg/kg) (Table 1).
